offsetTop.description: The distance from the top when the ceiling is raised, in rpx
offsetTop.description_zh: 吸顶时与顶部的距离，单位rpx

customNavHeight.description: Navigation bar height, this value is required when customizing the navigation bar
customNavHeight.description_zh: 导航栏高度，自定义导航栏时，需要传入此值

disabled.description: Whether to disable the ceiling function

zIndex.description: The z-index value at the time of ceiling lifting, NVUE is invalid

index.description: A custom identity to distinguish which component it is
index.description_zh: 自定义标识，用于区分是哪一个组件
